name: AVCameraCalibrationData
desc: Information about the camera characteristics used to capture images and depth data.

items.name: var intrinsicMatrix: matrix_float3x3
items.desc: A matrix relating a camera's internal properties to an ideal pinhole-camera model.

items.name: var intrinsicMatrixReferenceDimensions: CGSize
items.desc: The image dimensions to which the camera's intrinsic matrix values are relative.

items.name: var extrinsicMatrix: matrix_float4x3
items.desc: A matrix relating a camera's position and orientation to a world or scene coordinate system.

items.name: var pixelSize: Float
items.desc: The size, in millimeters, of one image pixel.

items.name: var lensDistortionLookupTable: Data?
items.desc: A map of floating-point values describing radial distortions imparted by the camera lens, for use in rectifying camera images.

items.name: var inverseLensDistortionLookupTable: Data?
items.desc: A map of floating-point values describing radial distortions for use in reapplying camera geometry to a rectified image.

items.name: var lensDistortionCenter: CGPoint
items.desc: The offset of the distortion center of the camera lens from the top-left corner of the image.
